page.title: 15Cheriton Fitzpaine - Health
page.content: One of the three Partners in General Medical Practice,each of whom lives in a neighbouring village, is always on call. They have built in the village,a surgery and dispensary,which operates an appointments system 5 days a week. For several years before 1976 a succesion of{Doctors}working alone lived in the village. Now the {Community Nurse/Midwife}does. There is an (un-manned){Sewage}Disposal Works, Refuse is collected weekly and a special vehicle sweeps the main streets occasionally. The{Water}Board supplies every house by high pressure mains and maintains the streams and gullies. In{1905}there were only earth closets and refuse was "thrown over the hedge" In{1965}a few houses in the main street still shared a communal water tap.
